ACM CoNEXT 2016

INF/UFRGS sends two students to the CoNEXT 2016 Conference

Students to present new papers at the conference.

INF/UFRGS researchers Oliveira R. and Marcos, P. will present two new papers at the Student Workshop of the ACM Conference on emerging Networking EXperiments and Technologies (CoNEXT) at Irvine, CA, USA. ACM CoNEXT is one of the top conferences in networking.

Lucas F. Muller 2016-12-10 CONFERENCES
